fields.summary: MobileWeb: iOS - Headers - Application Error on launch

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
NOT a regression, occurs in 3.1.3.GA as well.
h5. To reproduce
1) Package KS for mobile web and open in devices Safari7 browser
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Image Views> Table View> Footers

h5.Actual result
Sections with no footers
h5.Expected result
Sections with footers
fields.summary: MobileWeb: KitchenSink - Footers - won't be displayed on packaged for mobile web application
fields.environment:
Mac osx 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311221859
Titanium SDK, build 3.2.0.v20131122172908
KS 3.2.0.GA
Xcode 5.0.2
iPhone5S iOS 7.0.2 Safari7
BlackBerry Z10 browser
GalaxyS4 4.2.2 browser

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
